name: Mohammad Sajid Anwar
bio: Mohammad is a 2022 White Camel Awardee and CPAN [contributor](https://metacpan.org/author/MANWAR). He enjoys submitting pull requests and speaking at Perl Conferences. He runs [The Weekly Challenge](https://theweeklychallenge.org). He is also co-editor of [Perl Weekly newsletter](https://perlweekly.com). Find out more about him on his [website](https://manwar.org).
